评论概述: Super soft!  White recommend sizing up
评论详情: I’m am always on the hunt for a good white tunic this one is amazingly soft and has more of a fitted look which I love.  The underside has a nice soft layer and the white is not see through at all.  I did end up returning it as I felt the medium fit a bit snug (139lbs and 5”6) and felt the sleeves were a bit too short.  I wouldn’t say this is a true white, more cream/off white.

When this arrived I was shocked at how soft and cozy it is. I ordered the Large and it fits great. I also ordered the XL for a roomier fit but the Large fits just fine. I'm 5ft tall and the length is just over my butt. Not too long, not too short. Hits me just right.

I have two of these tops both size large. I really like the soft fabric, warmth and length that covers my behind. I first bought a pink one which fit as I expected. I then ordered a green one but did not try it on before I washed it. A mistake on my part. It is significantly larger about two inches larger everywhere. I don't know which is the proper sizing but I will wear the larger one for the warmth. I'm 5'7" and 160 lbs and normally wear a medium for A-line or flowy tops. This time I purchased a large to fit my bigger bottom. Be sure to try on before washing. I took off one star for the sizing issue.
Super comfy and warm! More like a sweater material but thin, in a good way! Loss fit making for the perfect lounge shirt!
I loved it the second I put it on. Great quality and comfortable fabric. Exactly what I was looking for. True to size.
I bought two of these (pink and green) the fit is tighter than expected so I don’t wear them.  I don’t know why Amazon list these as sweatshirts, they are more like a valor material.

I launder inside out to keep the black from fading and then hang to dry so as to avoid any shrinkage and there has been none.  Love this shirt.  Have two and will buy more.

评论概述: Soft material and fit as I hoped.
评论详情: Like the softness of the material and how well it fit.  Hopefully it retains it's shape and softest after I wash it.

评论概述: LOVE this if it fit me. Definitely reordering!
评论详情: I absolutely love this top. I posted a Pic just bc I always wish ppl would do it it to help me decide what size to get! I am 5'3 200-205lbs. I usually wear a Large for more fitted but still comfortable and not tight, or XL for bigger more comfortable (but not oversized).  This fits exactly how I'd want a large to fit. How I'd want a tee shirt to fit, but as a sweatshirt I'd prefer it a little bigger. Usually on amazon if I order an XL it's WAY to big. So I tried large. I'd say it's 100% true to size!!!  The material is super soft!! Nothing like I expected. The seams are good quality and it's made very well. I can't beleieve these are as cheap as they are! They're thick and warm but not super thick like alot of sweatshirts. They have way more stretch them than expected so if you like a tight fitted look. - probably downsize!  The color is great. How ever, I feel like EVERYTHING would stick to this material and show. I have to return to get a bigger size so I didn't get to wear and make sure.

It is super soft material. I weight 170 at 5'5" and ordered an XL. It fits nicely but is at the border line to being snug, so if you like your clothes loose maybe go up a size. I wish it didn't have the pocket though. Kinda makes it look like a man's shirt.

Bought this when it was on sale, I needed a basic black long sleeve shirt. It is soooo soft and warm! It might've shrunk a little bit after washing, that or it's just a shorter torso length than I'd prefer (I have a long torso, so I like them long), but it still fits and looks great. And did I mention it was soft?  I'll probably come back and buy more colors, the fabric is so scrumptiously soft and comfy!
Fit to size, soft, light weight and love the length great with leggings
Love these shirts! Wearing one right now. Asked for more for Christmas in other colors. So warm and comfy!

Shirt was comfy and fit loose and roomy which is what I was looking for. I went ahead and washed it (cold and line dry) but during the first wear, the fabric started severely shedding fuzz where my seatbelt made contact across my chest. I've spent the rest of my day sloughing fuzz onto everything. I'm afraid I'm probably going to end up with sheer patches before it's done shedding.
I did not the feel or the color of the sweater.
Love this shirt. It is very warm and soft. I’ve washed it multiple times and so far its held up very well.

I will probably purchase other colors if it goes on a bonus deal I think the pocket is a little cute detail. Looks great with jeans or sweatpants. I also feel it was true to size
Not only are these comfortable ( I got 3) but they are soft and so easy to care for plus a wide range of colors!  They run true to size btw.

Pretty color, nice soft fabric but my fault that I didn't check that this was made in China; therefore the size was off just as every other clothing item I've purchased that was manufactured there is always too small. Big thru the sleeves and shoulders, tight thru mid to low torso.

I just opened the pkg. I ordered the light, minty green shade that's true to product image. I haven't even put it on yet, but I already know I want more colors. The material is high quality, thicker, unbelievably soft with the perfect amount of stretch. I'll be cleaning out my closets and getting rid of even my basic white tee and replacing it with this! I just wore my white shirt yesterday. By the end of the day, from pulling my sleeves up and just wear of the day around the waist hem -everything is all stretched out. This will NOT happen with this shirt! By design, it appears to be a nicely manufactured, casual slightly oversized shirt. My mom asked to fwd the product link. She liked the feel too. It's so buttery soft. I can't wait to wear it. 😊 The manufacturer needs to go with it. Make a scoop neck, v-neck, fitted ladies tee - this is a beautiful fabric. 5 stars 🌟
I love this shirt. It washed nice and it is so soft. Would buy again.
Excalty what I was looking for, soft and fits perfectly!
